Brock Lesnar (c) vs. Roman Reigns vs. Seth Rollins in a Triple Threat match for the WWE World Heavyweight Championship Rollins was not originally scheduled to be in this match, but he cashed in his [[Money in the Bank ladder match|Money in the Bank]] contract while the scheduled Lesnar-Reigns singles match was in progress, turning it into a Triple Threat match.

tables.Date: 2020-04-04 The event was taped on March 25 & 26 and [[Broadcast delay|aired]] on April 4 & 5.
tables.Venue: WWE Performance Center Two matches were taped elsewhere. The Boneyard match was taped on location in the Orlando area, while the Firefly Fun House match was taped at [[Titan Towers|WWE Headquarters]] in [[Stamford, Connecticut]].
tables.Claimed attendance: 0 The event was attended only by essential personnel due to the [[COVID-19 pandemic]].
tables.Main event match(es): The Undertaker vs. AJ Styles in a Boneyard match

tables.Venue: WWE Performance Center Two matches were taped elsewhere. The Boneyard match was taped on location in the Orlando area, while the Firefly Fun House match was taped at [[Titan Towers|WWE Headquarters]] in [[Stamford, Connecticut]].

tables.Main event match(es): Brock Lesnar (c) vs. Drew McIntyre for the WWE Championship

tables.Venue: Raymond James Stadium Originally announced to take place on March 28, 2021, at [[SoFi Stadium]], [[Inglewood, California]]; moved due to California state regulations regarding sporting event attendance during the COVID-19 pandemic.
tables.Main event match(es): Sasha Banks (c) vs. Bianca Belair for the WWE SmackDown Women's Championship

tables.Venue: Raymond James Stadium Originally announced to take place on March 28, 2021, at [[SoFi Stadium]], [[Inglewood, California]]; moved due to California state regulations regarding sporting event attendance during the COVID-19 pandemic.
tables.Main event match(es): Roman Reigns (c) vs. Edge vs. Daniel Bryan in a Triple Threat match for the WWE Universal Championship
Kevin Owens vs. "Stone Cold" Steve Austin in a No Holds Barred match
Brock Lesnar (WWE) vs. Roman Reigns (Universal) in a Winner Takes All match for the WWE Championship and WWE Universal Championship
The Usos ( Jey Uso and Jimmy Uso ) (c) vs. Kevin Owens and Sami Zayn for the Undisputed WWE Tag Team Championship
Roman Reigns (c) vs. Cody Rhodes for the Undisputed WWE Universal Championship

The Bloodline ( The Rock and Roman Reigns ) vs. Cody Rhodes and Seth "Freakin" Rollins This match determined the stipulation of Night 2's main event. Since Rock and Reigns won, the [[Undisputed WWE Universal Championship]] match was a [[Anything Goes match|Bloodline Rules match]]. Had Rhodes and Rollins won, all members of The Bloodline would have been barred from ringside during the championship match.
Roman Reigns (c) vs. Cody Rhodes in a Bloodline Rules match for the Undisputed WWE Universal Championship

tables.#: (c) – refers to the champion(s) going into the match
